body.name: HARPPA Baby Bassinet Bedside Sleeper, Adjustable Bedside Crib with Storage for Newborns, Portable Bassinet with Anchor Strap (Wood Grain-Twins, Grey)
features: 【4 in 1 Convertible Mode】The 4-in-1 bedside bassinet for baby, the ultimate portable bassinet solution! This versatile and adorable baby bassinet serves as a standalone dream haven, a portable companion for on-the-go adventures, a secure baby bassinet that attaches to your bed, and a cozy baby cradle. With its innovative design, the portable baby bassinet provides the perfect combination of convenience and comfort. Embrace the flexibility and charm of our bedside bassinet.
【5 HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT】Experience ultimate versatility with our baby bassinet bedside sleeper, featuring 5 adjustable heights, perfect for accommodating various bed height.

【BETTER NIGHT SLEEP】Discover the ultimate convenience of sleeping bedside bassinet for baby. With a side zipper design for easy access and breathable mesh panels for maximum ventilation, it's the perfect companion for nursing moms. Care for your little one effortlessly and peacefully with our thoughtfully designed bassinet.

【PREMIUM WOOD FRAME】Crafted from robust hardwood, this baby bedside crib is lightweight and stands firmly in place when it's time for nursing, breastfeeding, or feeding. The triangular design ensures minimal risk of tripping or unintentional movement, while the hardwood frame adds a smooth and durable finish.

【ANCHOR STRAP ASSURANCE】This bedside bassinet's Anchor Strap offers unmatched stability, securely attaching the bassinet to your bedside for worry-free nights. Enjoy the assurance of a safe and snug sleeping space for your baby, right by your side.

【EASY AND TOOL FREE ASSEMBLY】Disassemble and fold our bassinet in under 25 minutes; A large storage basket under the bassinet makes it easy to store and pick up your baby's toys, blankets, etc.;Portable design folds for easy transport and storage, mattress cover can be easily removed and cleaned. Designed for newborn to 6 months (5-42 lbs).

【USA CPSC CERTIFICATION, SAFETY TESTED】 Third-party tested, adhere to all applicable safety standards and testing requirements. Our bassinet is certificated with ASTM F2194-16e and ASTM F2906-13. Comply with all CPSC and CPSIA standards.

【HARPPA Standard】We offer 6-month quality guarantee service for the baby bassinet. If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we will reply and follow up within 48 hours until the problem is solved. Log in to your Amazon account > select "Your Orders" > find the order ID > click "Contact Seller".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A newborn needs 16 hours of sleep a day. But you don't have to be confined in the bedroom. Bring this bassinet with you, so your baby can always be near you. *Lock the 360° swivel wheels as soon as you finished moving the bassinet. Increased air circulation during sleep time. An adequate breathable zone is a crucial element of a bassinet. Breathable mesh on both sides will eliminate suffocation risks and provide ventilation for your baby.

Safe Incline to prevent reflux. If your baby is having reflux like symptoms, put the bassinet at a safe incline. It will help prevent reflux from coming up. Large Storage Basket Useful for stashing a change of clothes, booties, toys, diapers, or wipes.

Anchor Strap System Unmatched stability for peaceful nights. Keep your baby safe and snug, right by your side. Third-party Tested Comply with all CPSC and CPSIA standards and testing requirements. Certificated with ASTM F2194-16e and ASTM F2906-13.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of Room for Two
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Twins Bassinet for Baby for my daughter-in-law, who is expecting twins. Ordering online without seeing it in person made me a bit apprehensive, but the quick delivery right to the door eased those worries, sparing us from the hassle of lugging around a heavy box. The bassinet itself is quite impressive, featuring a handy storage area for essentials. We opted for the pink version due to the first-choice color being sold out, and I must say, it's a lovely shade of pink – not gaudy at all. My son managed to put it together without encountering any major issues. The bassinet offers plenty of space for two babies, and the included separator is a practical addition. Overall, I'm pleased with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and compact baby bed
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I saw this pink stroller online, I really liked it, so I placed an order immediately. After receiving the goods, I started assembling it immediately. The assembly is also very simple. First, install the two fixed brackets on both sides of the crib. , and then install the storage basket at the bottom. The height of the bed can be adjusted. It also comes with a small bed for baby changing diapers and a mosquito-proof cover. The small bed is pink and tender. , just suitable for my sister, the bed is movable, and it is convenient for me to take her to other houses to do anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: pros: easy to put together! took about 20 minutes and I'm 8 months pregnant and did it by myself while the husband was at work lol.aesthetically pleasing to the eye and seems like a good quality bassinet.cons: doesn't rock as well as you would expect but it does the job.it's a bit of a hassle to put the changing station off and remove it after, but not difficult. I can just imagine I will be getting lazy after changing the baby so many times and laying her back down and removing the station so many times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave my daughter a baby shower. And this is the gift that I gave her. She loves it and my twins are so comfortable in it

Love this thing first of all, it really helps with my twins but you have to work it in first. AT FIRST it’s gonna be really wanky and off balance, and I was so upset snd gonna send it back but that’s just because it’s stiff at first. After a few nights it leveled out really nicely and now it’s completely level! To be fair it was only off by a degreee or two in some spots but still lol as a first time mom I have all the worries. I would highly recommend this bassinet. JUST REMEMBER ITS WANKY AS FIRST (unlevel).

Babies will use these longer than other bassinets as they are quite larger than the others in the market. Only issue is that the two mattresses are linked together and I was not able to find any sheets that fit them. So I’m using a swaddle blanket to cover the mattress, not ideal as it does not stay straight like a fitted sheet would.
